actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of certain natives of the Philippines who served in the U.S. Armed Forces during World War II.

summary.text: Authorizes the issuance of immigration visas to any alien, and his spouse and children, who is a native of the Phillipines, who served for at least three years in any United States Armed Force during World War II, and (if already separated from such Force) who was separated under honorable conditions.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of certain natives of the Philippines who served in the U.S. Armed Forces during World War II.
